ML engineer

I'm a multidisciplinary ML engineer with a background in computational neuroscience, AI, and creative software development. I enjoy building systems that explore the intersection of brains, code, and tools for insight. Trained as a scientist, I combine strong academic/research skills with hands-on engineering across disciplines. I value usefulness and novelty, I enjoy making things that serve real needs, whether it's for safety, health, efficiency, or everyday utility. If something can make life better for a lot of people, I'm excited to build it.
